poster.username: 不忘生养之仇，立志杀父弑母

body: 末尾的文献列表震撼了我。这本子挺认真的啊

Love story!!! Especially the shota sense is the sweatest part!!!! Unfortunately, I'm not kind of tiny and cute male, that means there wouldn't be such experience in my life. 
Hope life treats me with its kindness, so that I can read more doujinshi about love story.
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga
